# Calendar Table (Specific Dates) {.normal_slide}
```{}
Month Table 1 = 
var CalendarDates = 
 GENERATE ( CALENDAR(
  DATE(2020, 01, 01),
  DATE(2020, 12, 01)),
 ROW (
  "Month", DATE(YEAR( [Date] ), MONTH ( [Date] ), 01) )
 )
```

# Calendar Table (Auto-generated) {.normal_slide}
```{}
Month Table 1 = 
var CalendarDates = 
 GENERATE ( CALENDAR(
  DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, 01, 01),
  DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, 12, 01)),
 ROW (
  "Month", DATE(YEAR( [Date] ), MONTH ( [Date] ), 01) )
 )
```

# Calendar Table (Auto-generated) {.normal_slide}
```{}
Month Table 1 = 
var CalendarDates = 
 GENERATE ( CALENDAR(
  MIN(Table[Date]),
  MAX(Table[Date]),
 ROW (
  "Month", DATE(YEAR( [Date] ), MONTH ( [Date] ), 01) )
 )
```
